item.description:
Join NHC'er Josh at the Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Sinergy Bar & Grille in New Haven. This event is being hosted by The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section, and runs from 5:30 PM to 8:00 PM.

This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals. Sinergy Bar & Grille will be providing free beer and well drinks for the 1st hour and drink specials will be provided for the rest of the evening. Sinergy Bar & Grille will also be providing free appetizers to all attendees.

Josh will be attending the event and can be contacted at (203)772-0070 if anyone has any questions.
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Sinergy Bar & Grille
